layer module¶

class layer.Layer(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: function.Function

Abstract model of a neural network layer. In addition to Function, a Layer also has weights and gradients with respect to the weights.

set_optimizer(optimizer_obj, isBatchNorm=False, isLinear=False)¶
